  • Method Details

    • deserializeJsonArray

      public static <T> Vector<T> deserializeJsonArray(String filePath, Class<T> classType) throws IOException
      Generic function for deserializing a JSON file into a Vector of classType objects
      Type Parameters:
      T - Generic type
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to JSON file to be read from stored as a string
      classType - Class type of objects to be deserialized
      Returns:
      Vector of classType objects
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if file cannot be read

    • serializeJsonArray

      public static <T> void serializeJsonArray(Vector<T> vector, String filePath) throws IOException
      Generic function for serializing a Vector of objects into a JSON file
      Type Parameters:
      T - Generic type
      Parameters:
      vector - Vector of objects to be serialized
      filePath - Path to JSON file to be written to stored as a string
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if file cannot be written

    • processJsonFile

      public static <T> void processJsonFile(String filePath, T newInstance)
      Generic function for processing a JSON file
      Type Parameters:
      T - Generic type
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to JSON file to be processed stored as a string
      newInstance - New instance of the class to be processed
